attributes.action: Make security personnel mandatory in all UK schools
attributes.additional_details: Schools should be safe spaces. The rise in violent incidents, threats, and intrusions shows that children, teachers, and staff are vulnerable. Mandatory security personnel would deter crime, ensure faster response to emergencies, and give parents peace of mind.
attributes.background: We want the UK Government to make it a legal requirement for every school in the country to have trained security personnel on-site during all hours when children are present. Schools should be safe spaces.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Provide funding for schools to hire a security guard to protect our children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715050
